name: Dytrinxy
description:
Dytrinxy is the first game made by Faithlux Studio. 
This version is used to test features and collect feedback from players. These features will then be improved and integrated into the "Steam Edition".
In Dytrinxy you fight in different arenas against different types of monsters that always spawn in waves. In the first wave, there are only 5 monsters you have to defeat, there will always be one more per wave!

Each arena has a different "main enemy" by killing the monsters you get Coins, Fragments and XP. With these Coins and Fragments you can buy Items in our Item shop ! You can also build your own level in the Level Editor ! You can choose different types of walls and statues and pillars, after you build your level you can Play your own level !

In the near future I will do a design competition, you can build a level and send pictures of it to me. Then I choose the best one and the best one will come in the game for everyone! The test versions really helped me a lot to optimize and adapt the game, also very good suggestions were made what could be added. Thanks to all testers! But now it's your turn ! Download, try it and say me your opinion about my first game !

Known bugs :

  • Coins and fragments collected in the round are not displayed in the "Died screen".
  • The mouse cursor is sometimes a cross.
  • Menu anchor bugs

Join our Discord and give us feedback or chat with the developer !
